attributes.action: Parliament to Implement the 2016 Referendum Vote to Leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament is trying to impose Conditions on Implementing the 2016 Referendum Vote. There were no Conditions in the 2016 Referendum Vote. Parliament is not acting in accord with the promises made by PM Cameron or the Parliamentarians who agreed to Implement the Referendum Vote.
attributes.background: In 2016 PM Cameron gave the Electorate the choice to Leave or Remain in the EU in a Referendum.  This Referendum was won by the Leave Voters. Parliament Voted to Implement the Referendum Vote. This has not happened.
